ingredients.item: 200g sweet kingdom carrots, julienned or coarsely grated
1 red chilli, deseeded and finely diced

instructions.step: To make the dressing, combine the sugar, fish sauce, lime juice and ginger in a small bowl, stirring to dissolve the sugar.
Combine the remaining ingredients in a large serving bowl. Pour over the dressing and toss through to mix. Serve straight away.
